name: The Disease Garden
description:
There's a rare plant disease going around infecting most plants that it finds! Keep your crops alive and earn enough money to pay the rent every 30 seconds.

For some reason the web game didn't work here so please check out  https://leotti.itch.io/disease-garden-web if you don't want to download the game.

Remember to come back here to vote, sorry for the inconvenience. If the game doesn't work in your browser, you can download a file that fits your computer.
